title: School Natural Disaster Education Literature Analysis and Statistics-Based Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical analysis and academic research skills
context.additional_context: Adaptive design for smartphone-based learning environments, emphasizing project collaboration.

learning_goals: They can analyze research trends in academic literature related to natural disaster education using quantitative and qualitative methods.
They can apply a research quality assessment framework by utilizing international journal data (e.g., SJR).
When designing school-based disaster preparedness education programs, they can integrate literature analysis results with practical case studies.

resources: Smartphone-Compatible Statistical Analysis Tools (e.g., Google Sheets)
Open Access Academic Database Access Permissions
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
